description: Lorenz Caffier denies any involvement with extremist groups he was in charge of fighting.
title: German regional minister resigns over far-right links to gun purchase
title_page: German regional minister resigns over far-right links to gun purchase - BBC News
maintext: Nordkreuz (German: Northern Cross) is a so-called "prepper" organisation whose followers train for doomsday scenarios like the collapse of national order. Several members have had links to the police and military, and the group has been accused of preparing to carry out political assassinations.
